ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( ISPICKVAL( CH_Process_Stage__c , "Implement"), OR( NOT(CH_Customer_Delivery__c) , ISPICKVAL( CH_Implemented_by__c , "") , CH_Follow_up__c =null, CH_Action_Executed__c =null, CH_Result__c =null ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please Complete Customer Delivery,Implemented by,Follow-up ,Action Executed,Result Fields
